title: Best of The Herd for Aug 19, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for Aug 19, 2020
description:
The Lakers lost because of something that happened to LeBron

Giannis is very similar to Lamar Jackson

Bill Belichick is fooling everyone

Proof last night that Russell Westbrook isn't valuable


Guest: Nick Wright, FS1's First Things First

Monty Williams, Phoenix Suns Head Coach

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
